EmailTemplate.name: EGPWS subscription Quotation
EmailTemplate.subject: Terrain Subscription Quotation {!Account.Name} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your email. There are two subscription plans for you to choose from. The first plan is the 1 update plan in which you get your single update per year and if you need another update before the year is up, it is $231 per tail number. There is also a 6 update plan in which you still get your free update per year but then you pay $119.20 each/per tail number for the other 5 updates in the year. This is $596 per tail number per year. You have xxx aircraft so if you choose the 6 update plan it would be $ xxxx.xx per year.
Thank you,
Terrain Database Services - EGPWS Account Management Representative(AMR) Email: dsa@honeywell.com
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
